chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
items.plainText: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:

items.text: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
items.plainText: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.

items.text: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
items.plainText: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;

items.text: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
items.plainText: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,

items.text: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
items.plainText: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.

items.text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
items.plainText: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.

items.text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
items.plainText: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,

items.text: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
items.plainText: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.

items.text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
items.plainText: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;

items.text: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
items.plainText: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.

items.text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
items.plainText: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

items.text: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
items.plainText: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;

items.text: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
items.plainText: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

items.text: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
items.plainText: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

items.text: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
items.plainText: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
